languages.text: "Так точно, Ваша Светлость. Немедленно передам госпоже Зауэрбэк вашу волю. Побои немедленно прекратятся".
"Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will convey your will to Mistress Sauerback right away. The violence will stop immediately."
languages.original_text: "Так точно, Ваша Светлость. Немедленно передам госпоже Зауэрбэк вашу волю. Побои немедленно прекратятся".

traits.locale_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will convey your will to Mistress Sauerback right away. The violence will stop immediately."
"Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will convey your will to Mistress Sauerback right away. The violence will stop immediately."

"Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will convey your will to Mistress Sauerback right away. The violence will stop immediately."

languages.text: “您说得对，大人。我马上将您的意愿传达给苏尔贝克女士，暴力行为将会即刻停止。”
languages.original_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will convey your will to Mistress Sauerback right away. The violence will stop immediately."

traits.locale_text: “您说得对，大人。我马上将您的意愿传达给苏尔贝克女士，暴力行为将会即刻停止。”

languages.text: «Desde luego, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Transmitiré su voluntad a la señora Sauerback enseguida. La violencia cesará de inmediato».
languages.original_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will convey your will to Mistress Sauerback right away. The violence will stop immediately."

traits.locale_text: «Desde luego, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Transmitiré su voluntad a la señora Sauerback enseguida. La violencia cesará de inmediato».

languages.text: 「その通りです。あなたの意志をすぐにザウアーバック様に伝えて、暴力を直ちに止めます」
languages.original_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will convey your will to Mistress Sauerback right away. The violence will stop immediately."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りです。あなたの意志をすぐにザウアーバック様に伝えて、暴力を直ちに止めます」

languages.text: "Jawohl, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich werde Meisterin Sauerback Euren Wunsch umgehend übermitteln. Die Gewalt wird sofort ein Ende haben."
languages.original_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will convey your will to Mistress Sauerback right away. The violence will stop immediately."

traits.locale_text: "Jawohl, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich werde Meisterin Sauerback Euren Wunsch umgehend übermitteln. Die Gewalt wird sofort ein Ende haben."

languages.text: « Entendu, Votre Seigneurie. Je vais de ce pas transmettre vos instructions à maîtresse Sauerback. À compter de cet instant, l'usage de la violence est exclu. »
languages.original_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will convey your will to Mistress Sauerback right away. The violence will stop immediately."

traits.locale_text: « Entendu, Votre Seigneurie. Je vais de ce pas transmettre vos instructions à maîtresse Sauerback. À compter de cet instant, l'usage de la violence est exclu. »

languages.text: "Doğru dediniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İsteğinizi bir an önce Sauerback Hanım'a ileteceğim. Şiddet kullanımı derhâl son bulacak."
languages.original_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will convey your will to Mistress Sauerback right away. The violence will stop immediately."
